text:
e="preserve">Kenneth Alexander Mitchell (born 25 November 1974) is a Canadian actor. He was born in Toronto. His career began in 2000. He is known for playing many Klingon characters '. He also played Deke Slayton in ABC's "The Astronaut Wives Club" television drama series.
In 2006, Mitchell married actress Susan May Pratt. They have two children.
In February 2020, Mitchell revealed that he was diagnosed with ALS in 2019.
